statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ 3 \\ 0 \\ -2 \\ 3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ -1 \\ 0 \\ 3 \\ -3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -6 \\ -2 \\ 0 \\ 6 \\ -6 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ -11 \\ 0 \\ 12 \\ -15 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -15 \\ 39 \\ 0 \\ -40 \\ 51 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ 0 \\ 1 \\ -1 \\ -1 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
